Song.title: O Wondrous Love
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Steve & Vikki Cook © 2001 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [G/B]O won[C]drous [C]love,{,} that [G/B]will [C]not [C/E]let me [F]go I [G/B]cling [C]to You{,} with [G/B]all [C]my [C/E]strength and [F]soul, Yet [C/E]if my [G]hold should [Em7]ever [Am]fail [Am/G] This wondrous [Fmaj7]love{,} will [Gsus]never [G]let me [C]go
Verse 2: [G/B]O won[C]drous [C]love, that’s [G/B]come [C]to [C/E]dwell in [F]me Lord, [G/B]who am [C]I{,} that [G/B]I [C]should [C/E]come to [F]know Your [C/E]tender [G]voice as[Em7]suring [Am]me [Am/G] Your wondrous [Fmaj7]love{,} will [Gsus]never [G]let me [C]go [C/E]
Bridge: I’m resting [F2]in the [Am7]ever[G]lasting a[F2]rms In the [Am7]ever [G]faithful [Am]heart, the [Am/G]Shepherd of my [F2]life You’ll [C/E]carry [F2]me{,} on Your [Am7]mighty [G]wings of [F2]grace Keeping [Am]me un[G]til the [Dm9]day{,} I [C/E]look into Your [F2 | Gsus G]eyes
Verse 3: [G]O wondrous [C]love, that [G/B]sings [C]of [C/E]Calva[F2]ry The [G/B]sweetest [C]sound{,} this [G/B]sin[C]ner’s [C/E]ever [F2]known The [C/E]song of [G]Your re[Em7]deeming [Am]Son [Am/G] Whose wondrous [Fmaj7]love{,} will [Gsus]never [G]let me [C (to bridge)]go
Verse 4: [G]O wondrous [C]love, that [G/B]rus[C]hes [C/E]over [F2]me I [G/B]can’t es[C]cape this [G/B]ri[C]ver’s [C/E]glorious [F2]flow You [C/E]over[G]whelm my [Em7]days with [Am]good [Am/G] Your wondrous [Fmaj7]love{,} will [Gsus]never [G]let me [C]go
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 o wondrous love that will not let me go i cling to you with all my strength and soul yet if my hold should ever fail this wondrous love will never let me go verse 2 o wondrous love thats come to dwell in me lord who am i that i should come to know your tender voice assuring me your wondrous love will never let me go bridge im resting in the everlasting arms in the ever faithful heart the shepherd of my life youll carry me on your mighty wings of grace keeping me until the day i look into your eyes verse 3 o wondrous love that sings of calvary the sweetest sound this sinners ever known the song of your redeeming son whose wondrous love will never let me go verse 4 o wondrous love that rushes over me i cant escape this rivers glorious flow you overwhelm my days with good your wondrous love will never let me go
